name: bija
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w2))

|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(wb(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), w2))

comment: Combine antecedents into a single biconditional. This inference, reminiscent of ~ ja , is reversible: The hypotheses can be deduced from the conclusion alone (see ~ pm5.1im and ~ pm5.21im ). (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2013.)
